sources.note: Main homepage — identifies eHana as cloud-based behavioral health EHR, 10,000 users, 150,000 clients. Key customers listed.
Minimal disclosures page — confirms vendor name, product version v2019-MU, ambulatory scope, certification date. No pricing or detailed limitations listed.

EHR features page — detailed feature list: clinical records, e-prescribing, scheduling, billing (837/835), staff management, document management with OCR, compliance/QA tools, role-based dashboards. HL7/HIPAA EDI/DIRECT interoperability. IBM-managed cloud hosting.

Massachusetts CBHC hub — 10,000+ monthly active users, 600,000+ documents/month, 250,000+ enrollments. Integrated e-prescribing with PDMP/EPCS, lab integration, zero-paid/bundled claims, care coordination tools.
About page — founded September 2000 in Honolulu, now in Boston. 100% independent and founder-owned. Startup-like culture.

News page — Care Management platform launch, ACO integration, ACCS module, CANS integration, Collective Medical integration, MSDP recertification. Serves 23/27 MA Community Partners, 56% ACCS clients. Giving program for nonprofits.
Certification docs page — EHI export in XML/C-CDA format, FHIR endpoints (test/production), SMART on FHIR API docs, SAML 2.0 SSO, Real World Testing plans/results 2022-2025.
Software Finder listing — confirms 5 main functional areas (operational tools, clinical record, billing/finance, staff tracking, document management). Notes lack of dedicated mobile app.

Capterra listing — 60% satisfaction from 2 reviews. Pros: organized records, good documentation. Cons: limited customization, no recurring appointments, slow loading. (403 error on direct fetch, info from search snippets.)
SelectHub listing — confirms integrated telehealth, client portal, customizable templates, billing tools. Suggests best for larger orgs. (403 error on direct fetch, info from search snippets.)
RocketReach company profile — 28 employees, $6.1M revenue estimate. (Info from search snippet, not fetched directly.)
Association for Behavioral Healthcare — confirms eHana as associate member. (Info from search results.)
